column21: var basedir = ; if ( inputdir != null ) basedir = inputdir; if ( outputdir != null ) basedir = outputdir; if ( basedir.match(/fasta$/) ) { basedir = basedir.replace(/fasta/, eland); return basedir; }

A UCSC BED track of junctions reported by TopHat. Each junction consists of two connected BED blocks, where each block is as long as the maximal overhang of any read spanning the junction. The score is the number of alignments spanning the junction.

column6: console.log("file: " + file); console.log("label: " + label); if ( file == null || file == "") return; var suffix; if ( file.match(/(.[^.]{1,5})$/) ) suffix = file.match(/(.[^.]{1,5})$/)[1]; console.log("suffix: " + suffix); file = file.replace(/.[^.]{1,5}$/, ""); if ( label != null) file += "." + label; if ( suffix != null ) file += suffix; console.log("Returning file: " + file); return file;

column18: Add this to the filenames of the converted files to identify the experiment/data test this
Complementary FASTQ reads file for input files

column3: Converted (ELAND_standalone.pl-compliant) complementary FASTQ reads file for input files
column6: console.log("file: " + file); console.log("label: " + label); if ( file == null || file == "") return; var suffix; if ( file.match(/(.[^.]{1,5})$/) ) suffix = file.match(/(.[^.]{1,5})$/)[1]; console.log("suffix: " + suffix); file = file.replace(/.[^.]{1,5}$/, ""); if ( label != null) file += "." + label; if ( suffix != null ) file += suffix; console.log("Returning file: " + file);   return file;

column18: FASTQ file not in ELAND format (for use with ELAND_standalone.pl)
Name of species, e.g., human, mouse, rat.
Paired-end mate file complementary to inputfile (e.g., s_1_2_sequence.fastq)
column21: if ( input1 != null && input1 != "" ) return input1; if ( input2 != null && input2 != "" ) return input2; for ( var i = 0; i < inputs.length; i++) { if ( inputs[i].category == "matefile" ) return inputs[i].value; else if ( inputs[i].name == "matefile" ) return inputs[i].value; }

column18: Print ELAND alignment files to this directory (will create the directory if it does not exist)
Paired read analysis parameters to pass to pickBestPair. Default: '--circular' (treats all chromosomes as circular).
Quality value of all bases in fasta mode (Default: 30)
Number of reads per sub-file
Directory containing squashed reference genome files
Length of read used for ELAND alignment (Default: min. of seedlength and 32)
Clean run (remove old splitfile)
